document.full_text: a minnesota father of three is the new voice of insurer aflac, taking over the iconic quacking-duck role from the fired comedian gilbert gottfried. his first commercial debuts online today.
document.title: aflac hires new duck voice to replace gottfried
lines_and_colors: a minnesota father of three is the new voice of insurer aflac, taking over the iconic quacking-duck role from the fired comedian gilbert gottfried. his first commercial debuts online today.
